## 0.2.9
``` shell
./tchmgr version
Tokyo Cabinet version 0.2.9 (103:0.1)
Copyright (C) 2006-2007 Mikio Hirabayashi
```

``` shell
$ ./tchtest write ./1000.hdb 1000
<Writing Test>
  path=./1000.hdb  rnum=1000  bnum=-1  apow=-1  fpow=-1  opts=0  omode=0  as=0

time: 0.005
ok
```
